borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted must be commenced not later than the expiration of THREE YEARS from the date of this permission.Reason: To comply with Section 92 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 and because of the scale and timescale of the development.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:BCA/13/04/01 Dated Apr 2013Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those in the existing building.Reason: To ensure the development respects the appearance of the existing property and to maintain the amenity of the area in accordance with Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Borough Wide Development Policies DPD (March 2011).

The development hereby permitted shall only be used as an extension to Unit 9 Northgate Industrial Park and shall not be used as an independent warehouse unit.Reason: To accord with the submitted scheme and Policy CM3 of the Core Strategy (July 2010) and the NPPF (March 2012).
description: Erection of extension to existing warehouse.
